page.title: 10CLOTHING IN BACK
page.content: {CHILDRENS' CLOTHES Most children wear clothes bought from mail-order catalogues,but nearly all have jumpers knitted by grannies or mothers. {ADULTS' CLOTHES } Many parents buy clothes by mail- order.Over half the older generation wear black as a sign of mourning. {CHURCHWEAR Nearly all islanders have at least 2 outfits for Sunday and all the females wear hats. {WORKWEAR Crofters wear boiler suits,thick socks and jumpers made from bobban.They often wear wellies and flat caps{ {SHOPPING} Almost everybody have Marks & Spencer underwear.The Pakistani shops are also popular with the younger generation.
